title: Resisting Mateo
description: If you dance with the devil, don't be surprised when all Hell breaks loose. PLEASE NOTE:  THIS IS NOT A STANDALONE. YOU WILL NOT ENJOY THIS IF YOU ARE NOT INVESTED IN THE CHARACTERS. DO NOT READ THIS IF YOU DIDN'T READ THE PREVIOUS BOOKS. Must be read in order! Or a unicorn dies. (Seriously, you do not want to start with this book. It'll be kookydooks.)
author: Sam Mariano
